captions.text:
God taught me justice
by showing me what injustice is.

He taught me how to fight
by making me face pain, humiliation and crime.

Zahir, tell me the truth
about what had happened.

If later I find out that
you hid something or lied to me..
..then I will drop your case.

Trust me, Shahid.
I haven't done anything wrong.
It's a case of creation of a perfect alibi.

Your Honour,
prosecution has no strong evidence..
..to prove that Faheem Khan is guilty.

Hello?
- Get this straight. Drop Faheem's case.

Shahid,
I want you to drop this case.

Why should I?
- I don't know why or how!

Why would any organization
relay on a handmade map?

Objection, Your Honour.
- For authentic information..

Your Honour, I didn't know..
- That's what I am saying.

That Mr. Shahid has a very good
knowledge about it.

No. What are you trying to say?
- With organizations..

Are you saying I am a terrorist?
- Jail..

Is she saying I am a terrorist?
What are you saying?

I said come with us!
- How can you do this!

Tell me, who all do you know
from these? Tell me!
I haven't done anything wrong, sir.

I haven't done anything wrong.
- Tell me..
The whole world is facing terrorism.
And I, too, am completely against it.

But it doesn't mean that
you can imprison any common man.

Where is Shahid?
- Shahid doesn't stay here.
Hey!

He is imprisoned only because his name is Zahir
and not Mathew, Donald, Suresh, More.
He is in prison only because of his name.
Do you think that you are a messiah?
A messiah for Jihadis?
Bloody traitor!

You do what you want to
do and I'll do what I want to do.
You'll get us killed, Shahid!
You'll get us killed!

You'll die a dreadful death.
- Go ahead and kill me.

Both cruelty inflictors
and its victims don't belong to any religion.
What happens?

It's a human who kills
and it's a human who dies.

title: Shahid | Official Trailer | Released on 18th October 2013

comments.text:
By 1500 BCE, a large group of nomadic cattle-herders, the Aryans, invaded 
and conquered the region, coming from the west, thus putting an end to the 
Indus civilization which may have had at its peak a population of 1 
million. Over the course of several centuries, they migrated from the 
northwest into the river Valley.
comments.author: sheik babu

comments.text:
Outnumbered by a subject people whom they considered inferior to 
themselves, the Aryans foresaw that without restrictions on intermarriage 
they would lose their racial identity in just a few generations. The first 
caste division, therefore, was not by status but by colour. We can see this 
in the early Sanskrit word for caste:várna, which means “colour”. This 
restriction divided the Aryans from the Dravidians (the original 
inhabitants of the region). Among the Aryans themselves, marriage was free
comments.author: sheik babu
